name: Roguelike demo (alzhu1)
description:
Demo for a roguelike. Levels are procedurally generated and increase in number as levels increase.

WASD/Arrow keys to move, hold Shift and a direction to attack.

Pixel art from https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Likely not revisiting this specific concept for a while, just putting out what I was able to do after getting sick, then losing interest.
